languages.text: {n}Вокс-передача сменяется треском, переходящим в неровный ультразвуковой гул — мгновение, и связь приходит в норму.{/n}
{n}The vox-cast is interrupted by a crackle that turns into a ragged ultrasonic hum. A moment later, the connection returns to normal.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вокс-передача сменяется треском, переходящим в неровный ультразвуковой гул — мгновение, и связь приходит в норму.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The vox-cast is interrupted by a crackle that turns into a ragged ultrasonic hum. A moment later, the connection goes back to normal.{/n}
{n}The vox-cast is interrupted by a crackle that turns into a ragged ultrasonic hum. A moment later, the connection goes back to normal.{/n}
{n}The vox-cast is interrupted by a crackle that turns into a ragged ultrasonic hum. A moment later, the connection returns to normal.{/n}

{n}The vox-cast is interrupted by a crackle that turns into a ragged ultrasonic hum. A moment later, the connection returns to normal.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un restallido interrumpe la transmisión para producir un zumbido ultrasónico irregular. Un segundo después, la conexión recupera la normalidad.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The vox-cast is interrupted by a crackle that turns into a ragged ultrasonic hum. A moment later, the connection returns to normal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un restallido interrumpe la transmisión para producir un zumbido ultrasónico irregular. Un segundo después, la conexión recupera la normalidad.{/n}

languages.text: {n}突如其来的噼啪声打断了音阵通讯，随后，通讯器中传来了不规则的声波嗡鸣声。过了一会之后，通讯重新恢复了正常。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The vox-cast is interrupted by a crackle that turns into a ragged ultrasonic hum. A moment later, the connection returns to normal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}突如其来的噼啪声打断了音阵通讯，随后，通讯器中传来了不规则的声波嗡鸣声。过了一会之后，通讯重新恢复了正常。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La transmission-vox est subitement interrompue par un crépitement qui se mue en bourdonnement ultrasonique saccadé. Un instant plus tard, la communication est rétablie.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The vox-cast is interrupted by a crackle that turns into a ragged ultrasonic hum. A moment later, the connection returns to normal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La transmission-vox est subitement interrompue par un crépitement qui se mue en bourdonnement ultrasonique saccadé. Un instant plus tard, la communication est rétablie.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ヴォックスメッセージがパチパチという音で中断され、ラグのある超音波のブーンという音に切り替わる。まもなく、接続が正常に戻る。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The vox-cast is interrupted by a crackle that turns into a ragged ultrasonic hum. A moment later, the connection returns to normal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴォックスメッセージがパチパチという音で中断され、ラグのある超音波のブーンという音に切り替わる。まもなく、接続が正常に戻る。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Voks yayını, bir çatırtı ile kesiliyor ve bunu ultrasonik bir uğultu takip ediyor. Bir saniye sonrasında ise bağlantı normale dönüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The vox-cast is interrupted by a crackle that turns into a ragged ultrasonic hum. A moment later, the connection returns to normal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Voks yayını, bir çatırtı ile kesiliyor ve bunu ultrasonik bir uğultu takip ediyor. Bir saniye sonrasında ise bağlantı normale dönüyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Vox-Übertragung wird durch ein Knistern unterbrochen, das zu einem lauten Ultraschallsummen anschwillt. Einen Moment später normalisiert sich die Verbindung wieder.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The vox-cast is interrupted by a crackle that turns into a ragged ultrasonic hum. A moment later, the connection returns to normal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Vox-Übertragung wird durch ein Knistern unterbrochen, das zu einem lauten Ultraschallsummen anschwillt. Einen Moment später normalisiert sich die Verbindung wieder.{/n}
